ability.flavor: You project an illusory aura that makes you and allies harder to notice.
ability.target: Self and each ally in the area

metadata.flavor: You project an illusory aura that makes you and allies harder to notice.

effects.effect: Each creature in the area has a double edge on tests made to hide or sneak. The aura lasts until you end it (no action required) or until a target harms or deals damage to a creature or object.
